install.name: GCalendar Overview
install.author: allon
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: This module shows the google calendar at a module position.

param.name: name
param.label: Calendar name
param.description: The name of the google calendar. Specified in the GCalendar component.

param.name: url
param.label: Url
param.description: Alternative url for a calendar. If this url is set the calendar url will be ignored.

param.name: scrolling
param.label: Scroll Bars
param.description: SHOW/HIDE HORIZONTAL AND VERTICAL SCROLL BARS.
